channel.title: SFDoug tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from SFDoug.

item.description: Makes me think of Sam McCloud. Well done, @NYPDnews https://t.co/dQ4TWENUtE
item.source:markdown: Makes me think of Sam McCloud. Well done, @NYPDnews https://t.co/dQ4TWENUtE

item.description: This is cool stuff. Thanks @SpinItSocial for calling attention to it. https://t.co/fguJUhmBgV
item.source:markdown: This is cool stuff. Thanks @SpinItSocial for calling attention to it. https://t.co/fguJUhmBgV

item.description: @Sally_K Oh no. I’m so sorry. This has been a rough year.
item.source:markdown: @Sally_K Oh no. I’m so sorry. This has been a rough year.

item.description: @yaelbt I’m cat sitting for a week and learning similar lessons. Stocked up on Band-Aids, too.
item.source:markdown: @yaelbt I’m cat sitting for a week and learning similar lessons. Stocked up on Band-Aids, too.

item.description: @ALorkowski @prjctfish @JeromeAdamsMD @GOP @USSupremeCourt @mtg @GovRonDeSantis Nor do you gain the right to impose your religion on others.
item.source:markdown: @ALorkowski @prjctfish @JeromeAdamsMD @GOP @USSupremeCourt @mtg @GovRonDeSantis Nor do you gain the right to impose your religion on others.

item.description: @ALorkowski @prjctfish @JeromeAdamsMD @GOP @USSupremeCourt @mtg @GovRonDeSantis The Constitution also does not permit imposing any religion on anyone. You can pray however you like, as long as it doesn’t infringe on or impose your religion on others as part of a government sponsored event.
item.source:markdown: @ALorkowski @prjctfish @JeromeAdamsMD @GOP @USSupremeCourt @mtg @GovRonDeSantis The Constitution also does not permit imposing any religion on anyone. You can pray however you like, as long as it doesn’t infringe on or impose your religion on others as part of a government sponsored event.
